hymn.title: Everything's alright in the Father's house

layout.singingstanza: Ev -- ery -- thing's al -- right in the Fa -- ther's house, In the Fa -- ther's house, In the Fa -- ther's house, Ev -- ery -- thing's al -- right in the Fa -- ther's house, In the Fa -- ther's house.

lyrics.stanza: Everything's alright in the Father's house, In the Father's house, In the Father's house, Everything's alright in the Father's house, In the Father's house.
We are all at home in the Father's house...
We have perfect peace in the Father's house...
We are loving God in the Father's house...
We smile all day long in the Father's house...
We are satisfied in the Father's house...
We love Jesus Christ in the Father's house...
Bring Your children back to the Father's house...
